item.title: Cohort Analysis With Python
item.description: Cohort analysis is one of the simple and effective tool to better understand how customer interact in business. We can look whether the customer are coming back, or whether their value are improved over time. A simple tools that should be on every data analytics toolbox. But first, what is a cohort? What is cohort? The technical definition of cohort analysis is behavioral analytics that breaks data into relevant groups and observes how their behavior changes over time.
